title: Bus Schedule Announcement
transcript: Attention passengers, due to road construction on Main Street, Bus Route 45 will be delayed by approximately fifteen minutes today. The bus normally arrives at the shopping center at 10:30 AM, but today it will arrive at 10:45 AM. All other stops will also be fifteen minutes late. This delay will continue for the rest of this week. We apologize for any inconvenience. For alternative routes, please check our website or call customer service at 555-0123.
